name: Shiro Neko
description: Shiro Neko ($SHIRO) is a memecoin on the Ethereum blockchain. Shiro Neko, “White Cat” in Japanese, is embarking on a journey to prove himself in the crypto sphere. Under the mentorship of the legendary Shiba Inu, Shiro learns the ways of blockchain, striving to build his own legacy with $SHIRO. Together, we'll follow in the paws of greatness , LP Burned -- Contract Renounced Our mission is to create a fun and engaging ecosystem where every holder is part of the pack. Whether you’re a seasoned crypto enthusiast or a newcomer eager to join the latest trend, $SHIRO offers an accessible and rewarding experience.
